data.enText: Somehow we kept the boat afloat.
data.chText: 我们想办法使船没有下沉。

data.enText: having enough money to pay debts; able to survive
data.chText: 有偿债能力；能维持下去

data.enText: They will have to borrow £10 million next year, just to stay afloat .
data.chText: 明年他们得举债1 000万英镑才能维持下去。

word_means: 漂浮；传播；在海上；在船上

means: 漂浮；传播；在海上；在船上

example.ex: They talked modestly of their valiant efforts to keep the tanker afloat...
example.tran: 他们说起自己设法使油轮漂浮的英勇之举时非常谦虚。

example.ex: Three hours is a long time to try to stay afloat in these conditions.
example.tran: 在这样的条件下漂浮3个小时是够久的。

gramarinfo.label: usu ADV after v, also v-link ADV, n ADV

value.def: If someone or something is afloat, they remain partly above the surface of water and do not sink.

example.ex: A number of efforts were being made to keep the company afloat...
example.tran: 正采取各种措施来维持公司的正常资金周转。

example.ex: They are borrowing just to stay afloat, not for investment.
example.tran: 他们借钱只为了周转，而不是投资。

gramarinfo.label: usu ADV after v, also v-link ADV, n ADV

value.def: If a person, business, or country stays afloat or is kept afloat, they have just enough money to pay their debts and continue operating.
